docs.lead_paragraph: The commonplace practice of billing rape victims in Louisiana for medical exams should come to an end after state lawmakers Tuesday signed off on proposed law changes that the federal government has required for a decade.

headline.main: Ban on Billing Rape Victims for Exams Passed by Legislature
headline.print_headline: Ban on Billing Rape Victims for Exams Passed by Legislature

docs.snippet: The commonplace practice of billing rape victims in Louisiana for medical exams should come to an end after state lawmakers Tuesday signed off on proposed law changes that the federal government has required for a decade.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Republican-run House committee voted Tuesday to repeal a 2.3 percent tax on many medical devices that helps pay for President Barack Obama's health care overhaul.

headline.main: House Panel Votes to Repeal Health Law's Medical Device Tax
headline.print_headline: House Panel Votes to Repeal Health Law's Medical Device Tax

docs.snippet: A Republican-run House committee voted Tuesday to repeal a 2.3 percent tax on many medical devices that helps pay for President Barack Obama's health care overhaul.

docs.lead_paragraph: A father-daughter doctor team on Monday filed a lawsuit challenging a Kansas state law due to take effect in July that would ban a common second trimester abortion procedure that lawmaker supporters termed "dismemberment abortions."

headline.main: Kansas Doctors Challenge 2nd Trimester Abortion Procedure Ban
headline.print_headline: Kansas Doctors Challenge 2nd Trimester Abortion Procedure Ban

docs.snippet: A father-daughter doctor team on Monday filed a lawsuit challenging a Kansas state law due to take effect in July that would ban a common second trimester abortion procedure that lawmaker supporters termed "dismemberment abortions."

docs.lead_paragraph: An abortion-rights group challenged Kansas' first-in-the-nation ban on a second-trimester procedure that anti-abortion activists describe as dismembering a fetus.

headline.main: Abortion-Rights Group Challenges New Kansas Restrictions
headline.print_headline: Abortion-Rights Group Challenges New Kansas Restrictions

docs.snippet: An abortion-rights group challenged Kansas' first-in-the-nation ban on a second-trimester procedure that anti-abortion activists describe as dismembering a fetus.

docs.lead_paragraph: Israeli medical experts have developed a wearable mobile monitor to keep a close watch on pregnant women and their fetuses as they go about their everyday lives.

headline.main: Wearable Device Provides Continuous Fetal Monitoring
headline.print_headline: Wearable Device Provides Continuous Fetal Monitoring

docs.snippet: Israeli medical experts have developed a wearable mobile monitor to keep a close watch on pregnant women and their fetuses as they go about their everyday lives.
